issue.title: [R] don't test metadata serialization on old R versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11224](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11224). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As of R 3.5, the serialization format has changed. Skip the metadata backwards compatibility tests on R versions <3.5

https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/runs/1686312890

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11224?focusedCommentId=17263624) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9179
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9179>
